class Card[source]

Card(suit=0, rank=2)

This is a card Attributes: suit: integer 0-3

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Card is a class that represents single card in the deck of cards

{% raw %} 
Card(suit=1, rank=1)

Ace of Dimonds
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
c = Card(suit=1, rank=3)
c

3 of Dimonds
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
assert str(c) == '3 of Dimonds'
